nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Department of Mathematics

biogHist.p: In existence since the University's opening classes, the Department of Mathematics offers undergraduate and graduate programs with interdisciplinary components in statistics, physics and computing science, as well as an undergraduate program in the Faculty of Arts. The Department has done active research in areas such as mathematical physics, topology, differential equations and mathematical biology. It is associated with the Applied Mathematics Institute at the University. Professors: 1908-1910 Henry Marshall Tory; 1910-1947 Ernest Wilson Sheldon; 1947-1954 John William Campbell; 1954-1961 Ernest Sydney "Frank" Keeping. Heads: 1961-1963 Max Wyman; 1963-1964 Leo Moser; 1964-1966 Andrew Lloyd Dulmage; 1964-1966 Arthur E. Livingstone; 1966 Leo Moser. Chairs: 1966-1971 John Ross McGregor; 1969-1970 W.A.
